attributes.action: NHS staff to get free parking by default.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS staff have put themselves on the line during this Covid-19 pandemic, without appropriate PPE and suffering staffing shortages. We clap for them but ignore the challenges they face in their roles. The least we could do is allow them to get to work and park without worrying about parking charges.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to provide free on-site parking for all NHS staff. At the moment, permits are not guaranteed for NHS staff, I would like for this to changed and all staff given a permit.
